data.description: Covers informal consent processes with local village authorities or customary landholders. Required in practice for site access and project acceptance, though not formally documented.

notes.informal_notes: Banjar-level gatekeeping is especially relevant in rural districts of Denpasar. Even municipal-zoned areas may require relational alignment. Customary logic often supersedes legal entitlement.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: Community blessing ceremonies or leader visits often signal acceptance — these moments carry more weight than formal signatures.
notes.feedback_structure: No structured appeals. Trust-building, benefit sharing, or mediation required if rejected.
failure_modes: Silent veto from village head delays application filing
Disputes between formal land title and customary claims
Local actors request unregulated compensation or recognition
